sqlMap.select: SELECT ss.day as day, SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(s.to_hour, s.from_hour)))/3600 as schedule FROM tbl_store_schedules as ss, tbl_employee_schedules as es, tbl_shifts as s WHERE ss.store_schedule_id = es.store_schedule_id AND es.employee_schedule_id = s.employee_schedule_id AND s.position_id IS NOT NULL AND ss.day BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#start_date#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(#end_date#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND ss.store_id = #store_id# GROUP BY ss.day ORDER BY ss.day
